July 09, 2015

参考式链接的范例

I get 10 times traffic from [google] [1] than from [Yahoo] [2] or [MSN] [3]. [1]: http://google.com/ “Google” [2]: http://search.yahoo.com/ “Yahoo Search” [3]: http://search.msn.com/ “MSN Search”

如上所示，gitPages好像并不支持这种参考式链接

可以改写为

I get 10 times traffic from google than from Yahoo or 新浪.

圆括号一定要紧紧跟在方括号的后面，不能有空格

Markdown语法参考链接

The postings on this site are my own and I am only responsible for myself
